column1: commercial  men  will  need  some  assistance  from  the  courts  in  determining  their
obliga(cid:415)ons. The only assistance which the court can give in prac(cid:415)ce is to say that,
whilst  everything  must  in  the  end  depend  on  the  words  actually  used  by  the
par(cid:415)es, there is nevertheless a presump(cid:415)on that, if certain elements are present in
the documents, the document will be construed in one way or the other.
